_header: France and Flanders then shall rise
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 441.
_description: A political prophecy — one cross-rhymed quatrain

BLLan762.Transcription: ffrance and fflaunders than shall ryse…
